verbose_text: Conversely, co-expression of PY mutant form of Ndfip proteins fails to reduce the plasma membrane localization of Robo1 (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), suggesting that these motifs are critical for Ndfip proteins to regulate Robo1.
evidence: PY mutant form of Ndfip proteins fails to reduce the plasma membrane localization of Robo1 ( XREF_FIG  and  XREF_FIG ), suggesting that these motifs are critical for Ndfip proteins
